aircraft.value: Hydra Advanced - AC-1956-918 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 28/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 29/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 29/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 31/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 07/01/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
